primary_trope.name: david_vs_goliath
primary_trope.hook_text: Unbound Gravel 200 vs The Mid South

beats.label: HOOK
beats.narration: Unbound Gravel 200 versus The Mid South. One entry fee. Two options. Five rounds of data. Let's settle this.
beats.text_on_screen: Unbound Gravel 200 vs The Mid South
beats.editing_note: Boxing match energy. Split-screen slam. Avatar in boxing stance. IKEA EFFECT: 'Predict the winner before I reveal it.'
beats.psych_mechanism: IKEA effect (prediction) + tribal identity (pick a side).

beats.label: TALE OF THE TAPE
beats.narration: Unbound Gravel 200. Emporia, Kansas. 200 mi. The Icons, 80/100. The Mid South. Stillwater, Oklahoma. 100 mi. The Icons, 76/100.
beats.editing_note: Quick stats comparison. Establish both races before diving in.

beats.label: ROUND 1: Logistics
beats.narration: Logistics. Unbound Gravel 200 takes it by one. 4 to 3.
beats.text_on_screen: Logistics: Unbound Gravel 200 4/5 vs The Mid South 3/5
beats.editing_note: Round 1 of 5. Split-screen: each race gets its score simultaneously. Winner side gets a subtle glow/pulse.

beats.label: ROUND 2: Length
beats.narration: Length. Unbound Gravel 200 takes it by one. 5 to 4.
beats.text_on_screen: Length: Unbound Gravel 200 5/5 vs The Mid South 4/5
beats.editing_note: Round 2 of 5. Split-screen: each race gets its score simultaneously. Winner side gets a subtle glow/pulse.

beats.label: ROUND 3: Technicality
beats.narration: Technicality. Close call. Unbound Gravel 200 edges it. 3 to 2.
beats.text_on_screen: Technicality: Unbound Gravel 200 3/5 vs The Mid South 2/5
beats.editing_note: Round 3 of 5. Split-screen: each race gets its score simultaneously. Winner side gets a subtle glow/pulse.

beats.label: ROUND 4: Elevation
beats.narration: Elevation. Close call. Unbound Gravel 200 edges it. 3 to 2.
beats.text_on_screen: Elevation: Unbound Gravel 200 3/5 vs The Mid South 2/5
beats.editing_note: Round 4 of 5. Split-screen: each race gets its score simultaneously. Winner side gets a subtle glow/pulse.

beats.label: ROUND 5: Expenses
beats.narration: Expenses. Saved the best for last. 4 to 2. The Mid South closes it out.
beats.text_on_screen: Expenses: Unbound Gravel 200 2/5 vs The Mid South 4/5
beats.editing_note: Round 5 of 5. BIGGEST GAP — save dramatic energy for this one. [RIFF HERE] after score reveal. Split-screen: each race gets its score simultaneously. Winner side gets a subtle glow/pulse.

beats.label: VERDICT
beats.narration: Unbound Gravel 200 takes it. 4 rounds to 1. 80 out of 100 vs 76. The scorecards don't lie.
beats.editing_note: SURPRISE WINNER technique: even if one was clearly better, delay the reveal. Build through dimensions first. [RIFF HERE] after verdict lands. End ABRUPTLY after verdict.

beats.label: CTA
beats.narration: Full breakdowns for both on the site. Links in bio.
beats.engagement_question: Which one are you picking? Drop it in the comments.

thumbnail_prompt: South Park style split screen, two cartoon cyclists facing off, 'Unbound Gravel 200' vs 'The Mid South' bold text, boxing match energy --ar 16:9 --cref [CHARACTER_URL]

cross_platform_notes.youtube: Primary platform. Enable mid-roll ads if >8 min.
cross_platform_notes.extract_shorts: Pull 3-5 Short clips from hot take moments within 48hrs.
cross_platform_notes.twitter_x: Post the most controversial data point as a standalone take.

production_checklist: [ ] B-roll sourced (check broll_sources in each beat)
[ ] Music track selected (check BPM targets per beat)
